=Killfest, Meet Motormaster, and likewise=
"Since you have arrived, I will fill you in on the details, this is 
Killfest" Astroblast replies, motioning at the big bot beside him. He 
then turns to Killfest, "Killfest, Motormaster," introducing the two.  
Ok, lets continue in your base to get the rest of the information." 
Then to Motormaster, "I will inform you of the conversation while we 
follow Killfest to his base. We don't have to leave right away, you 
may want to talk to Killfest."

------------------------------------------------------------------------
=Watching and listening to the above |^| converstation=
"Whoa, there's Motormaster, he just arrived, it might be fun to 
crash the party... Eh, Wildrider?" says Drag Strip his partner. "We 
should probably contact him first, though..."

------------------------------------------------------------------------
=At the Stunticon Landing Site=
"Motormaster, Dead-End here, we've begun energon mining and the 
preperations for base setup. We will continue until your return or 
other orders. Dead-End out." the bot shuts off his com-link



On 24 Jan 2001, at 7:49, Robert Dahl wrote:

> Motormaster slid to a stop in front of the four bots he recognized. He then
> transformed, his head and right arm still smoking from his battle, "well"
> he said.
